data.comment: The match has started.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Seattle.
In the minute 4, It's a goal kick for the away team in Seattle.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Portland in the half of Seattle.
In the minute 7, Can Seattle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
Ismail Elfath signals a Portland throw-in in Seattle's half.
Portland to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
In the minute 8, Throw-in Seattle.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
In the minute 10, Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Andres Flores puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Throw-in for Seattle at CenturyLink Field.
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 13, Seattle drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Can Portland capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Seattle's half?
Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
In the minute 17, Portland are coming forward and Diego Valeri gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
Seattle to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
In the minute 19, Joao Paulo of Seattle gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Portland at CenturyLink Field.
Throw-in for Seattle in the half of Portland.
In the minute 21, Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
Ismail Elfath awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 25, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Jordy Delem.
Brian Schmetzer (Seattle) is making a first substitution, with Alex Roldan replacing Jordy Delem.
Corner awarded to Portland.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Seattle.
Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 34, Free kick Seattle.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Free kick for Portland in their own half.
In the minute 37, Portland advance rapidly upfield but Ismail Elfath blows for offside.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Portland in the half of Seattle.
In Seattle, Felipe Mora (Portland) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
In the minute 41, Seattle have a goal kick.
In Seattle a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ismail Elfath signals a Portland throw-in in Seattle's half.
In the minute 42, Ismail Elfath signals a throw-in for Portland, close to Seattle's area.
Throw-in for Portland close to the penalty box.
Portland's Eryk Williamson misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 43, Ismail Elfath awards Seattle a goal kick.
Portland have a dangerous throw-in.
In Seattle, Will Bruin (Seattle) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Portland at CenturyLink Field.
The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Seattle.
In the minute 45, Seattle have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in Seattle.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at CenturyLink Field.
Portland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Portland close to the penalty box.
In the minute 48, Diego Valeri (Portland) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Throw-in Portland.
In the minute 50, Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Seattle Seattle attack through Jordan Morris. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 52, Portland have a goal kick.
Jordan Morris (Seattle) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
In the minute 53, Seattle attack but Yeimar Gomez Andrade's header doesn't find the target.
Ismail Elfath awards Portland a goal kick.
Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seattle's half?
In the minute 55, Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Seattle's Will Bruin breaks free at CenturyLink Field. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seattle.
In the minute 57, Seattle's Nouhou Tolo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seattle.
Portland push upfield and Felipe Mora gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Seattle defence.
In the minute 59, Play has been interrupted briefly in Seattle to check on Diego Chara, who is grimacing with pain.
Diego Chara is back on the pitch.
Goal kick for Seattle at CenturyLink Field.
In the minute 64, Free kick Seattle.
Can Seattle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
Andres Flores is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 67, Andres Flores is back on his feet again.
Kelvin Leerdam's header is off-target for Seattle.
Ismail Elfath awards Portland a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Portland have a goal kick.
Free kick for Portland in their own half.
Ismail Elfath signals a Portland throw-in in Seattle's half.
In the minute 73, Seattle are pushing forward but Nicolas Lodeiro's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
The away team has substituted Andres Flores with Pablo Bonilla. Giovanni Savarese is thus making his first change.
In the minute 75, Portland have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Diego Valeri for Portland gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Seattle have a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Portland.
Seattle are pushing forward but Nicolas Lodeiro's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seattle.
In the minute 79, Goal kick for Portland at CenturyLink Field.
Seattle needs to be cautious. Portland have an attacking throw-in.
The home team have replaced Kelvin Leerdam with Shandon Hopeau. This is the second substitution made today by Brian Schmetzer.
In the minute 81, Ismail Elfath awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Seattle in Seattle.
Jaroslaw Niezgoda is replacing Felipe Mora for Portland at CenturyLink Field.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Seattle in the half of Portland.
Seattle's Joao Paulo breaks free at CenturyLink Field. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
In the minute 84, Seattle are in shooting range from this free kick.
Shane O'Neill's header is off-target for Seattle.
Ismail Elfath awards Portland a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Miguel Ibarra is on a sub for Shane O'Neill for Seattle.
Throw-in for Seattle in their own half.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
In the minute 87, Portland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Seattle at CenturyLink Field.
In the minute 88, In Seattle a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal kick for Seattle at CenturyLink Field.
Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Seattle close to the penalty box.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ismail Elfath will wait an extra 7 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
Seattle needs to be cautious. Portland have an attacking throw-in.
Seattle have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Seattle in the half of Portland.
The match has come to a close in Seattle. The final score is 1-1.
Will Bruin grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at CenturyLink Field.
